title: harbinger
text: Habinger framework event detection time series.

title: harbinger
text: can install development version harbinger GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") library(devtools) devtools::install_github("cefet-rj-dal/harbinger", force=TRUE, dependencies=FALSE, upgrade="never", build_vignettes = TRUE)

title: harbinger
text: Examples Harbinger available : https://nbviewer.org/github/cefet-rj-dal/harbinger/tree/master/examples/ organized according general functions, anomalies, change points, motifs, multivariate anomaly detection.

title: Time Series Multilayer Perceptron (MLP) — ts_mlp
text: Type artificial neural network used make predictions forecasts based time series data. Consists multiple layers interconnected nodes neurons, using supervised learning algorithm, processes input data passes . output final layer provides predicted values future.
